website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price per liner for a product that works nicely for multi-cat boxes.
pros: At a size of 36 by 18 inches, this cat litter box liner will fit large boxes
Makes use of a drawstring closure that simplifies removing the bag from the box
Delivers a lower price than many cat box liners of a similar size
cons: Material is thinner than most other extra-large liner options

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, and I got a bonus in my order...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first about the product - they're Giant! Bigger than whatever I was buying before. Which is nice because there are no awkward creases that my cat's claws end up catching when she's scratching in the litter. Now, about this seller - I paid like $4 as an "add on item". I thought this was a reasonable price for a box of 15. I don't know if I just lucked out or if it's supposed to be multiple boxes for that price, but I actually received SIX boxes of 15. I actually don't like buying in bulk (small apartment in NYC), but I can't complain about getting six times what I thought I was getting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: May be alright for someone else, not for my Edward Scissorcats....
customer_reviews.text: These seem easy in theory, until you try to pull it up and realize that your cat has scratched holes in the bottom of it trying to cover their business. It gets messy, unless your cat doesn't have claws. (Side note-please don't declaw your cats. It is bad for them)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Great for all Cat owners
customer_reviews.text: Always have used these, and I have two cats, one that is crazy with her claws. We have always found these to be strong, long lasting, and ones that don't always tear when you clean out your litter box with a pooper scooper. Any cat owner would appreciate these in the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Bradencn

customer_reviews.title: I like these liner's because they have a drawstring
customer_reviews.text: I use these liners every time I change the litter in our cat's pan. I like these liner's because they have a drawstring. You just pull on the drawstring and throw it in the trash. You put another liner in the pan, wrap the edge around the outside of the pan (the drawstrings will windup being under your pan) and pour fresh litter in on the liner. You are ready to go! I like getting my liners on Amazon because the store usually only sells boxes of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Special1s

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic liners at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, none of the big box stores in our area carry litter box liners. As someone who really doesn't enjoy scrubbing litter boxes (who does?), I'm hooked on using a liner. We'd bought another brand via Amazon, but they were so expensive! These liners fit our extra-large litter box just as well, and they hold up just as well, too. But the price is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bea Haven

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning litter so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Makes cleaning up the cat litter so much easier. I used to use actual trash bags but one of the litter boxes has very high sides and the regular trash bag would not work and would actually make a hammock of the litter in the box. This is not good. So when I found this I was really happy. It fits in the large litter box nicely and makes clean up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: se

customer_reviews.title: Fan for life!
customer_reviews.text: Good golly, I wish I'd come to the land of liners sooner. Not friendly for the environment, but leaves my nose much happier. I think it's far smarter to use these for clumping litter than having to rinse out the pan (now that I live in an apartment and can't just hose the box out in the yard - it's just a plumbing problem waiting to happen to dump rinse water down any kind of drain.) Very sturdy and fits perfectly over my cat's extra big, extra deep pan. Fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: These make life so much easier. I line the cat box, put the shield on and use binder clips to keep it all in place - my cat used the liner to cover her business and the binder clips put a stop to that. Every few days I pick the whole thing up by the draw stings and pop it in the trash. Couldn't be easier or cleaner. At Walmart I paid about the same price for 5 liners. I am sold on these.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - do not fit all brands
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good, but did not fit the Petmate Giant Litter Pan Cat Litter Box as I hoped they might. Still, I've used them in my smaller litter boxes and they have made cleanup much easier. One minor issue: I do find that my kitties can occasionally dig too aggressively and have torn the bottom of a bag or two in the process!
customer_reviews.author: ESterling

customer_reviews.title: The plastic is also very sturdy. My cat is a stray that tends to ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit large for my litter box but the drawstrings keep it in place. The plastic is also very sturdy. My cat is a stray that tends to exaggerate her digging but there were only tiny tears in it that doesn't spill litter on it's way to my large trash can about 10 yards away. I do throw all my litter stuff into a secondary garbage bag with the rest of my trash so to me the mini tears aren't a problem because it does it's job of keeping the litter box clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product! we were overwhelmed by stinky cat litter ...
customer_reviews.text: good product! we were overwhelmed by stinky cat litter smells and wrested with the best way to address, including some of the "high tech" self cleaning cat litter boxes. we elected to go "low tech" and i use inexpensive clay litter and replace it DAILY using these bags, which are easy to place in the cat litter box as well as remove. Voilá! no more stinky cat litter box!
customer_reviews.author: Bob P

customer_reviews.title: These definitely don't tear and are pretty durable. However urine leaks through the bottom and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the cheap liners at the dollar store but stopped because my cat would tear them up. These definitely don't tear and are pretty durable. However urine leaks through the bottom and gets trapped between the box and liner. This results in a horrible smell and I have to wipe down the box basically every day. I never had this problem with the super cheap ones, so I don't know what the problem is. I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: These are nice to keep your litter box clean
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to keep your litter box clean, but they're not a one-size-fits-all approach. The only negative is that the bag bunches up in my litter box, which makes it difficult to clean when pee and poop gets stuck between crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Works well in large litter pan
customer_reviews.text: Dependable and easy to use. We use these in a large litter pan (16"x22") and they are a good fit. We use the cheap, non-clumping clay litter and replace the liner and litter every few days. The drawstring is nice as it helps keep everything contained as we carry it to the garbage can. I wish the bag would close a little tighter when the drawstrings are tied, to help keep some of the odor in the bag while it's in our garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The price was what drew me to these. They turned out to be too big and in the end, I still had you use a garbage bag and clean out the litter box because the liner shredded. I'll find other uses for the rest of these bags but it will not go back in the litter box. If you have a jumbo sized litter box and your cats don't have claws, theses are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money!! I have a 5 week old kitten & even her little claws tear this cheap plastic trash bag! This looks just like the cheap trash bags from the store for a dollar they are just cut in half . Every time I went to change the box the bag was full of holes & would spill everywhere so I would just have to dump the littler box & still had to wash it out . I even lined it with 2 bags just to see & same thing so I will not be buying these again . Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep a litter box clean.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't live without these liners. The litter box is forever clean. No more scraping the bottom , no more stink that you can't get out. My 4 cats are not declawed and the liner holds up without tearing. I also use it for a ferret cage, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mayzie67

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I use it for: to go under a Tidy Cat Breeze box filled with pine pellets, to catch the urine soaked sawdust. As such, I just care that it can carry a week's worth of sawdust without breaking and won't leak puddled pee should that occur. These work fine at a good price. Love that it' savailable on Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: CathyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The product description says that the bag is tear-resistant so ...
customer_reviews.text: The product description says that the bag is tear-resistant so cat's claws can't rip them up but my cat claws through the bag making cleanup messy. I have tried using them a couple of different times and I have found many holes in bag. (I clean litter daily and change out litter weekly).
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had Known About These Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: The concept is very simple: These are a little plastic trash bag for your litter box that is shallow but wide so it can be used to line it. Despite the simple concept these are worth their weight in gold. These fit our large litter box no problem and last against a cat that loves to scratch deeply while in her box. Even though they end up with a few tiny tears the bag still holds up well enough to easily replace the litter and keep the litter box nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Heather HW.

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable liners!
customer_reviews.text: These liners are the best. Plenty roomy for a large Square litter box with hood like I have. When I change the box this liner is strong and does not rip. You just lift it and tie it closed. I highly recommend this. I am a repeat buyer of these. They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ku'ulei

customer_reviews.title: Strong Solution for Rectangular Litter Boxes
customer_reviews.text: Good durable material. Takes moderate scraping by the claws of our two kitties if they dig too deep through the litter. Fits our plastic litter box faily well. I say "fairly" only because our litter box is more rounded than most--to look more chi-chi, I guess. This has nothing to do with the quality of the bags, but they are best suited for litter boxes which are more obviously rectangular.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Convenient quantity. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Damned WalMart for carrying a product just long enough to make it popular and then switching to the next cheapest thing from Asia when it becomes available. What's surprising is that these are about the only thing WalMart doesn't stock in industrial/summer camp quantity packages.
customer_reviews.author: J M Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: Lower Price Means Lower Quality
customer_reviews.text: These liners are very thin and don't last long before they are a shredded mess. They are cheaper than others for a reason. As I'm going through these faster than the more "expensive" brand I've used, these are actually more costly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Litter Box Liners
customer_reviews.text: We find these letterbox liners to be exceptionally handy while traveling. They make cleaning things up after our two cats very easy. The only shortcoming I see for us is that the liners are a bit too large and then fit too loosely over the litter box. However, we just take a tuck in them and then they're fine. They should last us a long time. as our travels are very irregular.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good litter liners, always have a problem if not using jonny cat jumbo but these appear to be slightly larger. Not as thick as I want but no tearing or problems with holes.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up to digging
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bases on reviews that claimed these held up well to insistent diggers. Spoiler alert: they do not. Double-ing up on bags may help. Will try that next.
customer_reviews.author: Nino Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for years and love it
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for litter. They don't rip easily and are big. The draw strings work well and make it easy to carry out when it's time to throw out. I've been using them for years and have been very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Khalili

customer_reviews.title: THIN
customer_reviews.text: These liners are too thin. My cat and kitten tore through the bottom of them the first day. I will double up on them because I don't want to waste them. You get what you pay for. Johnny Cat is the best I found so far so I will stick to them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lee Madaras

customer_reviews.title: Excellent litter box liners
customer_reviews.text: These are the only litter box bags I buy. The price on Amazon cannot be beat and they work wonderfully. They are large and thick and the drawstring works great. They don't get holes in them - definitely heavy duty. But my favorite part is the price and the amount that comes in the box. Most boxes only give you 5, so this product is great! I will be bummed if Amazon stops selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite liner
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cat box liners I have bought. They are large enough and have a drawstring and clean up easily. I just pull them out and put them in the trash bag. I change the box every day or at the most every other day and these are affordable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy but not large enough
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of these litter lines. I used them for both my rabbit's and my cat's litter box and they held up perfectly. No tears whatsoever. However, they weren't actually large enough to work with my top opening litterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering again when I run out.
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt that these liners will fit deeper litter boxes. I have a small to medium size litter box and these fit the circumference nicely, but were baggy and deep. I just used the scooper though to tuck the baggy sides under the litter. I like that these have a drawstring feature. These bags are basically just a more shallow version of a trash bag. Same material, so i'm sure the hold up is the same.
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: These make cleaning the litter box so easy, even with covered litter boxes we use them ...
customer_reviews.text: These make cleaning the litter box so easy, even with covered litter boxes we use them with. After a Couple days, you just pick up the bag with litter and all and toss in the trash. They've kept our litter boxes from getting gross, and made cleaning so easy even my young children can now change the litter box
customer_reviews.author: Sammywhack

customer_reviews.title: This is basically a mini trash bad. You will need to empty the entire litter ...
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a mini trash bad. You will need to empty the entire litter box and not just use it to sift out the bad stuff.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty durable liners
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty durable liners. My kitten has put a couple of holes in them but only occasionally. The only problem I have is that they are sooo big. I wish they offered a large size instead of jumbo. However, for the price you can't really go wrong with these bags.
customer_reviews.author: sugarplums16

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price - they make my life much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to these litter box liners, I can easily replace the litter without having to wash the box thoroughly. The box is well protected and only need a rinse with a bit of detergent (if you want to), otherwise you can just go ahead and replace the liner and use it. The liners are very resistant and they adapt easily to different box shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Superman from Delaware

customer_reviews.title: but I wish they were a bit more stretchy on the top so they would stay better. I think a normal littler box would work ...
customer_reviews.text: They are okay. I have a corner littler box and Gin (my cat) likes to pull the sides down. They fit, but I wish they were a bit more stretchy on the top so they would stay better. I think a normal littler box would work better with them, though they still need a better stretch on the top, so it would hold around the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and the price was very affordable
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves to dig to the bottom of the litter box and pee on the plastic - these keep the urine off the litter box itself. They fit great and the price was very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Sacks

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have repurchased these several times. They do the job and are usually the lowest priced litter box liners.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Ehh, helpful in some ways, but not the cleanup you're imagining...
customer_reviews.text: I mean, yes these help a bit with making the little box easier to clean - but my petite kitty scratches through these suckers easily. There's plenty of litter that escapes to the bottom of the pan, and it doesn't make cleanup the breeze I originally imagined. I'll use the supply I have, but I'll probably find a new brand if I continue to use a liner - these are ill fitting and always rip.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at quality
customer_reviews.text: I fully expected our cats to claw through these liners, but they hold up very, very well and are reasonably priced. There may be a small hole or two when you go to change it out, but overall they are remarkably strong and hold up to multiple cat use. They fit my large, oval-shaped litter pan and the cats adjusted to them right away. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: these are great, fairly thick
customer_reviews.text: these are great, fairly thick, but the cats still scratch them up pretty well. Though there aren't usually huge holes in the liners, just small holes with big stretched out spots.
customer_reviews.author: MommyRabbit

customer_reviews.title: We love this. We replace the liner about once a ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this. We replace the liner about once a month. If our cats nails rip a whole in it, then obviously sooner. This has helped make scooping easier and a more quick cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic, fits large boxes.
customer_reviews.text: These are thinner plastic than some liners I've seen - this means that it doesn't really work fully as a liner and I still have to scoop some litter out of the actual pan. Still, you get more for your money than other brands, and the bag is large enough for my Booda Dome box, so it's still better than many.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel M

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: THEY SEEMED THIN, BUT COMPLETED THE JOB NEEDED. I HAVE A LITTER ROBOT SO IT ONLY NEEDS TO CHANGE BAGS ONCE A WEEK. THEREFORE THE BAG SHOULD BE THICKER. WHEN THESE BAGS ARRIVED I WAS LITTLE DOUBTFUL THEY WILL DO THE JOB, BUT TO MY SURPRISE THEY DID IT ! WILL PURCHASE AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: sour melon

customer_reviews.title: Great economical liners.
customer_reviews.text: These litter liners are great. Heavy enough not to tear, big enough for even the largest litter box. (well maybe not for Main Coons, but they need a separate room)
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for jumbo litter!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely need this size for our great big litter box for our super fat cat. It fits over the sides of the box and stays there.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Strong liner
customer_reviews.text: Thick, scratch resistant liners good for the huge newer litter boxes with lids and doors. This seems to be a quality liner so far (we've used 3 with no leaks yet). The drawstrings are also convenient to get the liner tight on the box and seal up odors upon removal. It has worked equally well with both regular and clumping cat litter.

customer_reviews.title: Cat's Pride Jumbo Pan Liners
customer_reviews.text: These liners are great and fit very well for an extra large cat pan. Very strong and durable. Exact same product as in the store, but at a much better price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Cat seems to like them
customer_reviews.text: Well, I think “Love It” is a bit much for cat litter liners. Anyway, been using these for a while, cat does not object. Local source not so close, about half hour one way with traffic & such. Amazon so much easier and at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected from the Description
customer_reviews.text: Not only was my cat able to shred one of these liners within a day, they didn't even fit my litterbox despite being advertised as the right size for it. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Bainter

customer_reviews.title: They sell like a 5 liners for like a $1
customer_reviews.text: my area stop selling this brand. They sell like a 5 liners for like a $1.00 less but this has 15 and I like the brand. I try to put it with other things when I buy
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Nickles

customer_reviews.title: Clean up is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Have been using them for years. They fit the jumbo litter pan perfectly and makes clean up a breeze. Pull it up, pull the plastic strings to draw it closed and out it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as sturdy as others I have used but still really good
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Best So Far
customer_reviews.text: Best liners that I found so far. My cat is a terror in the litter box and these liners hold up pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Wallybird

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These fit my large litter box, and are heavy duty enough that kitty cannot scratch through them. They are wonderful for when litter needs to be changed. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: SevierNurse

customer_reviews.title: Nice Liners.
customer_reviews.text: Good liners. Strong. Fits my round Petmate Booda Dome litter box.
customer_reviews.author: elm

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for my large litter pans, at a fraction of the cost of the Whisker City product. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit size stated
customer_reviews.text: They are nowhere close to the advertised size! I have to use two to cover the size of the litter box. Its not a wrong product as the box states the correct size, but they are way too small to fit around the lip of the litter box by around 10in in length.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: ... plastic which means feisty claws don't tear it so easily. These are also nice and roomy and fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly thick plastic which means feisty claws don't tear it so easily. These are also nice and roomy and fit my oddly shaped Booda Dome. Better price than the local stores so will be ordering these again. I also love that they have a tie to close the bag up well after use.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Q

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to litter liners. Nice and big. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great size for the pan we have (20"x14"x4")
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our rabbits' litter pan. Great size for the pan we have (20"x14"x4")
customer_reviews.author: Mister Murse

customer_reviews.title: My prayers have been answered!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying everything to easily clean my cats litter box! So happy I finally found a way. Now to find the perfect litter.
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: they seem like quality liners and would work well in a smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat litter pan and hoped these liners would be large enough... sadly they are not. Other than the fit problem for me, they seem like quality liners and would work well in a smaller pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a lot
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more from the high ratings but the bag leaks. I've tried putting more litter and it helps but the litter ends up getting all over the house even with a litter mat.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: These are nice and big and fit a jumbo - sized litter ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and big and fit a jumbo - sized litter box. I've used stronger, thicker liners, but they were much costlier. These work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LauraBee

customer_reviews.title: If you procrastinate on cleaning the litter box(which really should be done every day) I highly recommend getting these and the perforated liners
customer_reviews.text: Used in combination with the perforated liners, these are the easiest clean up! I'll put about a weeks worth of perforated lines and then one of these, so I can re-use the unclumped litter for a week before it needs to be changed out entirely. If you procrastinate on cleaning the litter box(which really should be done every day) I highly recommend getting these and the perforated liners.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: I love these and continuously purchased them but I'm disappointed that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these and continuously purchased them but I'm disappointed that they are no longer an add on item for around $5. they are definely not worth the price they are asking for now. Will not be purchasing them unless they are a add on
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Works with dome litter box
customer_reviews.text: This liner is not as thick as the Jonny cat liners but it's thicker than most and it fits the dome litter box well. It also brings 10 more liners than the Jonny cat heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin plastic kitten clawed right through!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! My kitten ripped right through the plastic bag within 2 minutes. I was so excited about trying these bags because of all the good reviews. I was deeply disappointed. Will not be buying these again! Tear resistant???? Not at all. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: The Best Litter Bags
customer_reviews.text: These litter bags are the best. My cats don't tear through them. They are strong and fit the litter boxes very well. Definitely worth having. The drawstring is also strong and makes changing litter less of a chore.
customer_reviews.author: L. Secrest

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's happy.
customer_reviews.text: Quick cleanup - takes the drudge out of the task, and our 'owners' love a clean box.
customer_reviews.author: johnson

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the right size for my box but will do because the ones for my litter box you're not carrying right now.
customer_reviews.author: melissa vemi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The liners are big enough to cover my large sized cat litter box. They are easy to dispose of. They met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: ChrisS

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller and much thinner than the Tidy Cats Jumbo Litter bags. Maybe you get more because they are thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good for the convenience of not having to dump a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the convenience of not having to dump a litter box, just take the bag out and throw away. However my cats claw right through the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyDai

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a standard sized litter box, tough ...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for a standard sized litter box, tough enough to hold one week of my kitties poop. Affordable. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ZiKu

customer_reviews.title: Nice Liners = Easier Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Best priced pan liners that hold up nicely to vigorous clawing. Yes, my kitties do manage to make some holes but these liners make cleaning the litter boxes light-years easier than without!
customer_reviews.author: David J.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my covered litter box perfectly and clean up is MUCH more pleasant. Just throw it away after a week at our house... Fairly decent weight plastic, so they don't tear apart. There is a little plastic drawstring to make it fit also.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Running Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bags dont rip from my cat's claws and much more economical than the ones I used to get in supermarket
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Strong and economical
customer_reviews.text: works wonderful for both size of cat boxes we have in the house, it hasn't ripped on us and the price is perfect
customer_reviews.author: D.J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Cat still claws through it
customer_reviews.text: These served their overall purpose but the cat's claws still go through it. I wish they were a little thicker plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Received right on time and I have used these for long time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in the litter box. And these are durable. I'm in my fourth box of these, and had only one leak. It sure makes litter box maintenance a whole lot easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick enough bags with solid draw strings that can handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick enough bags with solid draw strings that can handle the weight of its contents when it is time to dispose of it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Robinson

customer_reviews.title: but is better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit extra extra large litter box, but is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlésa

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Very large, love the drawstring. These are white, not clear, like other bags I have gotten, and look pretty much like a garbage bag but wide and shallow. They get the job done, and the price here was very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I use two bags at a time and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: B-
customer_reviews.text: There good for cat litter a bit thin, but decent.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my cat who goes A LOT, and bus urine usually cakes to the sides of his box. Makes cleaning his box sooooo easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Shallow liners
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed ...these are definitely too shallow to be used in the bucket style little boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin!
customer_reviews.text: Used and even doubled the plastic but still it rips.. so no point in using a liner if it's not doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: tinkadoo16

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these - they keep from having to clean up the litter box as often.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Not Sally

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and durable cat box liners at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Smyre

customer_reviews.title: These do what they are supposed to do, but ...
customer_reviews.text: These do what they are supposed to do, but in my opinion they make it MUCH harder to clean the box because they don't stay in place. So they get stuck on the poop-scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron&Cat Haber

customer_reviews.title: Its just a specially shaped cheap version of a glad garbage
customer_reviews.text: yea my cat tore through this liner within a minute. Its just a specially shaped cheap version of a glad garbage bag
customer_reviews.author: Erin Y.

customer_reviews.title: These have worked out well, after I learned to ...
customer_reviews.text: These have worked out well, after I learned to put a few sheets of newspaper in the bottom under the litter to prevent claw punctures.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brinich

customer_reviews.title: I will not be buying these again because they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I will not be buying these again because they are very thin... much more so than their competitor Johnny Cat. They are scratched right through the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Ethereal

customer_reviews.title: The best liner
customer_reviews.text: Walmart had stopped carrying the 15 count size so I ordered from Amazon. Quick service and the same price. the liners hold up well and don't tear easily and are quick and easy to dispose of.
customer_reviews.author: millie m

product_meta.title: Cat's Pride Drawstring Jumbo Litter Box Liners, 15 Count
product_meta.description:
Size:15 CountCats Pride Liners are easy to use, the convenient drawstring makes tossing the litter out easier. Just pull, close and toss. Built to last, liners have to work as hard as litter, liners are heavy-duty and tear-resistant, so cats' claws can't rip 'em. Strong and durable, made with thick plastic that prevents odor-causing waste from sticking to the sides and bottom of the litter box.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Cats Pride Liners are easy to use, the convenient drawstring makes tossing the litter out easier. Just pull, close and toss. Built to last, liners have to work as hard as litter, liners are heavy-duty and tear-resistant, so cats' claws can't rip 'em. Strong and durable, made with thick plastic that prevents odor-causing waste from sticking to the sides and bottom of the litter box.
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty and tear-resistant so cat's claws can't rip them up
The convenient drawstring makes tossing the litter out easier
Will fit most cat litter trays
